typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Project ID} as string,
		Context as string,
		{Type of event} as string,
		{Type of Participant} as string,
		Status as string,
		{Registration Date} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> source1
source1 derive(Email = 'NULL') ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		{Project ID} as string,
		ContextCode as integer,
		EventCode as integer,
		A04 as string,
		Date as date,
		Country as string,
		A12 as string,
		SalesUSD as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
